author: pbs.org
title: Music Makes a City Now | Conversation with a Mentor PBS Arts
text: As Teddy Abrams prepares to guest conduct at Michael Tilson Thomasâ€™s 70th Birthday Celebration, which also honors MTT's 20 years as music director of the San Francisco Symphony, the two take a moment to talk between rehearsals. Watch this fascinating meeting of the minds, covering the challenges of conducting an orchestra to the cycles of creativity and pioneering unchartered musical territories.
